data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon now affecting the coast of southern China will moderate gradually today. The weather will remain rather cool in the morning over the region. Daytime temperatures will rise. The monsoon is expected to be replaced by an easterly airstream gradually today. Under the influence of the fresh to strong easterly airstream, it will be cloudier and relatively humid over the coast of Guangdong early next week. The northeast monsoon will affect Guangdong in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260124","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, becoming east force 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
